generalDisclaimer.title: IMPORTANT WARNING
generalDisclaimer.content: Modifying your vehicle's ECU carries significant risks. By using our files, you assume ALL RESPONSIBILITY for any consequences that may arise.

professionalAdvice.title: 1. NATURE OF RISKS
professionalAdvice.content: ECU reprogramming involves modifying the operating parameters of the engine and other vehicle systems. This may result in:
list: Mechanical damage: Engine, turbo, clutch, transmission failure
Electrical damage: ECU, sensor, actuator failures
Warranty loss: Complete voiding of manufacturer warranty
Emission problems: Non-compliance with environmental regulations
Legal problems: Traffic violations or local regulation breaches

accuracyOfInformation.title: 2. TOTAL LIABILITY EXEMPTION
accuracyOfInformation.content: WE EXPRESSLY DECLARE that we are NOT responsible for:
accuracyOfInformation.noGuarantee: Any direct, indirect, incidental or consequential damage, economic losses of any nature, damage to persons or property, traffic accidents or related incidents, fines, sanctions or legal proceedings, repair or replacement costs of components, loss of time, profits or opportunities, damage to third parties or their properties.

externalLinks.title: 3. NO PERFORMANCE WARRANTIES
externalLinks.noResponsibility: Specific increases in power or torque, improvements in fuel consumption, correct operation in all vehicles, compatibility with existing modifications, long-term engine durability, compliance with emission regulations, maintenance of original reliability.

limitationOfLiability.title: 4. USER RESPONSIBILITY
limitationOfLiability.content: By using our files, you accept that it is your EXCLUSIVE RESPONSIBILITY:
exclusions: To verify compatibility with your specific vehicle
To make backups of the original programming
To verify compliance with local regulations
To inform your insurance about modifications
To perform additional maintenance if necessary
To monitor vehicle operation after installation

technicalIssues.title: 5. PROFESSIONAL INSTALLATION RECOMMENDED
technicalIssues.content: WE STRONGLY RECOMMEND that installation be performed by professionals with experience in ECU reprogramming, specialized tuning shops, technicians with adequate equipment, people with advanced mechanical knowledge. WARNING: Incorrect installation can cause irreversible and dangerous damage.

userResponsibility.title: 6. LEGAL LIMITATIONS
userResponsibility.content: IMPORTANT: The use of our files may be illegal in certain jurisdictions, violate local emission regulations, breach traffic regulations, affect vehicle homologation, invalidate circulation permits.
responsibilities: It is your responsibility to verify and comply with all applicable laws in your location
Our files are designed for EXCLUSIVE USE IN COMPETITION AND CLOSED CIRCUITS
Use on public roads may be illegal and dangerous
The user assumes all responsibility for the use made of the files

modifications.title: 8. VEHICLE MODIFICATIONS
modifications.content: Modifications made with our files are IRREVERSIBLE in some cases, may require additional physical modifications, may affect other vehicle systems, may require specific fuels, may alter driving behavior.

governingLaw.title: 9. INSURANCE AND COVERAGE
governingLaw.content: WARNING: ECU modifications may void your insurance policy. It is your responsibility to inform your insurance company about any modifications and verify that you maintain adequate coverage.

contact.title: 10. RISK ACCEPTANCE
contact.content: By downloading and using our files, you expressly declare that: You have read and fully understood this disclaimer, you accept all risks associated with ECU modifications, you waive any claims against our company, you assume all responsibility for the consequences of its use, you have the legal capacity to assume these risks.
